# kong-gateway_acl (Resource)

ACL Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "kong-gateway_acl" "my_acl" {
  consumer = {
    id = "...my_id..."
  }
  group = "...my_group..."
  tags = [
    "..."
  ]
}
```
